change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "Indigenous governing body" was added by 2022-39-1(a), effective November 24, 2022 (Royal Assent).
Section 1 definition of "record of the proceeding", paragraph (g) was added by 2022-39-1(b), effective November 24, 2022 (Royal Assent).
Section 2 (1) BEFORE amended by 2010-6-62, effective July 1, 2010.

subsection.subsectiontext: An application for judicial review is an originating application and must be brought by petition.

change.changenote: Section 21 was enacted by 2007-36-105, effective April 3, 2009 (BC Reg 55/2009).
Section 22 was enacted by 2022-39-2, effective November 24, 2022 (Royal Assent).
